snippet: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission announced on Friday that its general counsel, Dan M. Berkovitz, would soon depart. His exit comes after the agency’s recent legal crackdown on Wall Street.
abstract: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission announced on Friday that its general counsel, Dan M. Berkovitz, would soon depart. His exit comes after the agency’s recent legal crackdown on Wall Street.

headline.main: Commodity Futures Agency's General Counsel to Depart

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
